/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the grandeur and scale of the cityscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The street itself is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban environment. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. In the distance, a highway overpass stretches across the frame, a testament to the city's infrastructure.
